title: Happy Belated Halloween
author: verias
text:
Hope you guys all had a good trick 'r treating night, and got to dress up all manner of wild and crazy.

The girls decided to make a go of it dressed as their favorite Overwatch characters.

I may, if time and interest permits, complete this piece as both a duo shot (like it is here), and two separate shots of the girls in these get-ups.

As it's fall, and things are grinding about, life is still hammering away at J and I, and with any luck, we'll be back to regular updates in the near future. Until then, I plan to continue to fill the space with various treats and trinkets for you guys.

Also, as it's a new month, there's also a new vote incentive up on TWC!

replies.author: Sario*Guest*
replies.text: I can only speak for myself, but I am very interested in seeing more of the girls in their costumes.

replies.author: Fairportfan*Guest*
replies.text: I can only speak for myself, but I am very interested in seeing more of the girls in less of their costumes.

replies.author: Adamas*Guest*
replies.text: For some reason I saw Theresa as Sombra when i thought about it.
